languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, я рассчитываю на место на борту вашего шаттла. Адептус Механикус будут благодарны вам за содействие".
"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I trust you will grant me a place aboard your shuttle. The Adeptus Mechanicus will be grateful for your cooperation."
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, я рассчитываю на место на борту вашего шаттла. Адептус Механикус будут благодарны вам за содействие".

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I trust you to grant me a place aboard your shuttle. The Adeptus Mechanicus will be grateful for your cooperation."
"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I trust you to grant me a place aboard your shuttle. The Adeptus Mechanicus will be grateful for your cooperation."
"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I trust you will grant me a place aboard your shuttle. The Adeptus Mechanicus will be grateful for your cooperation."
"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I trust you will grant me a place aboard your shuttle. The Adeptus Mechanicus will be grateful for your cooperation."
"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I trust you will grant me a place aboard your shuttle. The Adeptus Mechanicus will be grateful for your cooperation."

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich baue darauf, dass Ihr mir einen Platz in Eurem Shuttle gewährt. Der Adeptus Mechanicus wird Eure Kooperation gewiss gutheißen."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I trust you will grant me a place aboard your shuttle. The Adeptus Mechanicus will be grateful for your cooperation."

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich baue darauf, dass Ihr mir einen Platz in Eurem Shuttle gewährt. Der Adeptus Mechanicus wird Eure Kooperation gewiss gutheißen."

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, j'espère que vous me trouverez une place à bord de votre navette. L'Adeptus Mechanicus vous sera reconnaissant pour votre coopération. »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I trust you will grant me a place aboard your shuttle. The Adeptus Mechanicus will be grateful for your cooperation."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, j'espère que vous me trouverez une place à bord de votre navette. L'Adeptus Mechanicus vous sera reconnaissant pour votre coopération. »

languages.text: “大人，我相信你会允许我登上你的穿梭机。机械修会一定会感谢你的合作。”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I trust you will grant me a place aboard your shuttle. The Adeptus Mechanicus will be grateful for your cooperation."

traits.locale_text: “大人，我相信你会允许我登上你的穿梭机。机械修会一定会感谢你的合作。”

languages.text: 「陛下、あなたのシャトルに私の席はありましょうな。帝国技術局はあなたの協力に感謝する」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I trust you will grant me a place aboard your shuttle. The Adeptus Mechanicus will be grateful for your cooperation."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、あなたのシャトルに私の席はありましょうな。帝国技術局はあなたの協力に感謝する」

languages.text: «{mf|Milord|Milady}, confío en que me deje subir a bordo de su nave. El Adeptus Mechanicus agradecerá su ayuda».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I trust you will grant me a place aboard your shuttle. The Adeptus Mechanicus will be grateful for your cooperation."

traits.locale_text: «{mf|Milord|Milady}, confío en que me deje subir a bordo de su nave. El Adeptus Mechanicus agradecerá su ayuda».

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, mekiğinizde bana da yer vereceğinize inanıyorum. Adeptus Mechanicus, işbirliğiniz için minnettar kalacaktır."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I trust you will grant me a place aboard your shuttle. The Adeptus Mechanicus will be grateful for your cooperation."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, mekiğinizde bana da yer vereceğinize inanıyorum. Adeptus Mechanicus, işbirliğiniz için minnettar kalacaktır."
